name: haze
effect:
Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field.

This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Creates a black haze that
eliminates all stat changes.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Creates a black haze that
eliminates all stat changes.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Eliminates all stat
changes among all
POKéMON engaged in
battle.

haze that eliminates
every stat change
among all the Pokémon
engaged in battle.
